Topic.Title: Is there a way to unpublish a game?

Posts.EditableText: I have an unlisted wip game from a while ago sort of just sitting there- As I don't really intend to open the game to be playable anytime soon, is there any way to take it down? I can't seem to find a way to. ^^;
Posts.HTML: I have an unlisted wip game from a while ago sort of just sitting there- As I don't really intend to open the game to be playable anytime soon, is there any way to take it down? I can't seem to find a way to. ^^;

Posts.EditableText: Unfortunately not. But if you really want to stop someone who has the link from accessing it again, you could replace it with a blank game.
Posts.HTML: Unfortunately not. But if you really want to stop someone who has the link from accessing it again, you could replace it with a blank game.
